document_data.mainbody:
The Ladysluck Tower was a house of worship for Tymora in Yhaunn in the 14 century DR.
High Luck Priestess Jhyndara Thiolstar and her 34 fellow priests and priestesses of Tymora ran the temple in 1358 DR. Together they attended a congregation of 71 followers.
By 1373 DR, the High Luck was Colle Shoondeep. The temple had benefited from several very favorable leases granted by Lady Monstaeds deceased husband, which Variance Amatick transferred to Moonshadow Hall in the guise of Lady Monstaed.
